item.title: CVE-2024-0901|2024-03-25T22:37:56.581Z -- wolfSSL -- wolfSSL
item.description: Remotely executed SEGV and out of bounds read allows malicious packet sender to crash or cause an out of bounds read via sending a malformed packet with the correct length.
